definition: Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)

sentences.english: And have a chance for ourselves from beam wall be improved a lot later kungfu.
sentences.chinese: 并有机会师从梁壁令自己的咏春功夫得到很大提升。

sentences.english: Chum Kiu is a middle rank routine of Wing Chun.
sentences.chinese: 寻桥是咏春拳的中级套路。

sentences.english: In Wing Chun there is a set form for mook jong training.
sentences.chinese: 在咏春拳里有一套完整的木人桩训练体系。

sentences.english: I am at present mainly teaching Wing Chun to students in several schools and organizations in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 现时我主要在香港的几间学校及机构教授咏春拳。

sentences.english: Smuggling is checked, chant spring personnel casualty is numerous, 3 at the same time inside bottle.
sentences.chinese: 走私被查，咏春人员死伤众多，三支同时内斗。

sentences.english: Bruce was trained in the classical Wing Chun style.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯是受过训练的在古典咏春拳的作风。

sentences.english: Its improvement, given Yanyong Chun ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 并将其改良，授予严咏春先祖。

definition: military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
